PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_RailwayLevelCrossing
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties applicable to IfcFacilityPartCommon with PredefinedType set to LEVELCROSSING.

PropertyDef.Name: IsAccessibleByVehicle
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the element is accessible by a vehicle or not.

PropertyDef.Name: HasRailDrainage
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether there is rail drainage or not.

PropertyDef.Name: IsPrivateOwner
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates if the owner of the crossed road is private or not.

PropertyDef.Name: PermissiblePavementLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: Permissible traffic load on the pavement.

PropertyDef.Name: IsSecuredBySignalingSystem
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the level crossing is secured by a signalling system or not.

PropertyDef.Name: IsExceptionalTransportRoute
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the route is suitable for exceptional transport (load, structure gauge, road),
